Job Title: Estimator

Location: Livonia, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Summary

Per Sé Group is seeking an Estimator for our client, a distinguished construction and engineering leader known for delivering top-quality projects across various sectors focusing on innovation and sustainability. Their expert team and track record make them a trusted choice for excellence in the industry.

Responsibilities

Review proposal specifications drawings, attend pre-bid meetings, etc., to determine the scope of work and required contents of the estimatePrepare detailed trade scopes of work and backup documentation for reviewSolicit project-specific proposals from subcontractors and suppliers and evaluate them for completeness and competitivenessDevelop options and recommend best value solution based on cost, engineering, quality or availability of materialsEstablish and maintain positive relationships and ethical practices with owners, consultants, engineers, subcontractors and suppliersAssist Operations with awarded contracts and projects as required. This may included estimating/pricing change orders and facilitating the resolution of any contractual issuesTrack and assist operations with awarded contracts and projects as required – may include estimating/pricing extra work items, change orders, credit, procuring materials, etc.Work with Proposal Coordinator to develop complete professional proposals, including all required information (schedules, project narratives, organizational charts, etc.)Develop complete conceptual proposals to support business development and client maintenanceNegotiate and issue subcontracts

Preferred Skills and Expertise

Candidates must be proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, including Microsoft Project or other scheduling-related systems, and have experience working with On Screen Takeoff and/or MC2 type software is preferredCandidates must have a strong understanding of conceptual estimating, estimating techniques, and cost controlAbility to prepare proposals with minimum supervisionMust be comfortable working in teamsStrong written and verbal communication skills. Candidates should be able to clearly articulate bid inclusions, exclusions, and proposal clarifications with owners and subcontractorsMust be able to multitask and prioritize responsibilitiesA Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or Construction Management is preferredCandidates must have 7+ years of estimating experience

PandoLogic. Keywords: Construction Estimator, Location: Livonia, MI - 48154

Experience Level (if available): None
